Houston.Kathrine G. McGovern College of the Arts:
The Kathrine G. McGovern College of the Arts (KGMCA) is one of thirteen academic colleges at the University of Houston. Established in 2016, the College of the Arts is the newest college of the university with approximately 1,500 students.


== Departments ==
University of Houston School of Art
Moores School of Music
University of Houston School of Theatre and Dance


== Facilities ==
Cynthia Woods Mitchell Center for the Arts
Blaffer Gallery


== Academics ==
The college offers degree programs in the following areas: Fine Arts, Music, Theatre & Dance.
